terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers
Class Mapper

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers.Mapper
public class Mapper
extends java.lang.Object

Provides mapper related constants and utilities, such as for picking and spatial transformation.

Method Detail

toTargetSpace

public static javax.vecmath.Point3d toTargetSpace(javax.vecmath.Point3d input,
                                                  javax.media.j3d.Node source,
                                                  javax.media.j3d.Node target,
                                                  javax.vecmath.Point3d output)
Transforms the input point (position) value from the space defined by source node to the space defined by target node. The source and target space are arbitrary so this utility can be used to go from any one space to another.

Parameters:
input - Value to be transformed. Never null.
source - Node defining source space. Its capability bits must be set for ALLOW_LOCAL_TO_VWORLD_READ. If null then the source space is assumed to be the world space.
target - Node defining target space. Its capability bits must be set for ALLOW_LOCAL_TO_VWORLD_READ. If null then the source space is assumed to be the world space.
output - Container for the copied output value. Never null.
Returns:
Reference to the output value.

toTargetSpace

public static javax.vecmath.Vector3d toTargetSpace(javax.vecmath.Vector3d input,
                                                   javax.media.j3d.Node source,
                                                   javax.media.j3d.Node target,
                                                   javax.vecmath.Vector3d output)
Transforms the input vector (direction) value from the space defined by source node to the space defined by target node. The source and target space are arbitrary so this utility can be used to go from any one space to another.

Parameters:
input - Value to be transformed. Never null.
source - Node defining source space. Its capability bits must be set for ALLOW_LOCAL_TO_VWORLD_READ. If null then the source space is assumed to be the world space.
target - Node defining target space. Its capability bits must be set for ALLOW_LOCAL_TO_VWORLD_READ. If null then the source space is assumed to be the world space.
output - Container for the copied output value. Never null.
Returns:
Reference to the ouput value.

buildPickRay

public static void buildPickRay(javax.media.j3d.Canvas3D canvas,
                                javax.vecmath.Tuple2d pos,
                                javax.vecmath.Point3d rayOrg,
                                javax.vecmath.Vector3d rayDir)
Comptes and returns the origin and direction of a pick ray in world space. The ray origin is at the center eye in the display canvas and its direction is from the eye through the pick cursor display position.

Parameters:
canvas - The pick canvas containing the pick eye and cursor position. Never null.
pos - Cooked position of pick cursor in canvas. Never null.
rayOrg - Copy of the output ray origin. Never null.
rayDir - Copy of the output ray direction. Never null.

buildPickPlane

public static void buildPickPlane(javax.vecmath.Point3d hitPoint,
                                  javax.media.j3d.Node hitNode,
                                  javax.vecmath.Vector4d pickPlane)
Computes and returns a pick plane in world space that contains the hit point and whose normal is defined by the Z axis in the local space of the hit node.

Parameters:
hitPoint - Hit point on the hit node in world space. Never null.
hitNode - The hit node containing the hit point. Its capability bits must be set for ALLOW_LOCAL_TO_VWORLD_READ. If null the hit node is assumed to be in the world space.

hitPickPlane

public static double hitPickPlane(javax.vecmath.Point3d rayOrg,
                                  javax.vecmath.Vector3d rayDir,
                                  javax.vecmath.Vector4d pickPlane,
                                  javax.vecmath.Point3d hitPoint)
Computes the hit point on a plane as the intersection of a pick ray with the plane.

Parameters:
rayOrg - Pick ray origin in world space. Never null.
rayDir - Pick ray direction in world space. Never null.
pickPlane - Pick plane coefficients, with XYZ defining the normal and W defining the D coefficient. Never null.
hitPoint - If not null, copy of the output hit point on the plane in world space. Only valid if the returned hit distance is non-negative. Never null.
Returns:
Hit distance from the ray origin to the hit point. Equals Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY if no hit, <0 if hit is behind the ray origin, and 0 if at the ray origin.

isInPath

public static boolean isInPath(javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphPath path,
                               java.lang.Object target)
Searches the entire scene graph path to see if the target object is in the scene graph path. The search starts at the path root (Locale) and ends with the leaf shape (Object).

Parameters:
path - SceneGraphPath to be searched. Null if none.
target - Object that might be in the path. Null if none.
